sentences.en: A device that senses and stores the instantaneous value of an analog signal.
sentences.cn: 一种检测和存储模拟信号瞬时值的设备.

sentences.en: A solid - state analog controller eliminates radio frequency interference to sensitive equipment nearby.
sentences.cn: 半导体(固态)模拟控制器避免了对附近敏感设备的无线电频率干扰.

sentences.en: An alternate approach is to set up an analog model of the engine system.
sentences.cn: 另一种方法是建立发动机系统的模拟模型.

sentences.en: As to electronic compensation, digital or analog equalizers can be used.
sentences.cn: 在电路补偿方面, 可以使用数位或类比的等化器.

sentences.en: Digital networks are considerably less subjected to noise than analog networks.
sentences.cn: 数字网络不象模拟网络那样易受噪音干扰.

sentences.en: In analog computer, an arithmetic unit constructed by a servo system.
sentences.cn: 在模拟计算机中, 一种由伺服系统构成的运算部件.

sentences.en: Indicating a conversion from analog information to digital form.
sentences.cn: 表示模拟信息到数字信息的转换.

sentences.en: Its proposed signal is a hybrid, part analog and part digital.
sentences.cn: 其拟议中的信号是一种部分模拟与部分数字的混合波导联结.

sentences.en: Knee pain during exercises was assessed with visual analog scale ( VAS ).
sentences.cn: 运动过程中的疼痛用目测类比评分法评价.

sentences.en: One of them, the analog computer, is used essentially for problems involving measurements.
sentences.cn: 一种是模拟计算机, 它基本上是用来解决包含有测量值的问题.

sentences.en: The analog input signal is latched on the rising edge of CLK.
sentences.cn: 模拟输入信号在CLK的上升沿被锁存.

sentences.en: The analog signal contains high - frequency video information, which helps make up the picture.
sentences.cn: 模拟信号包括有助于构成图像的高频视频信息.

sentences.en: The voltage may provides an analog representation of the temperature difference.
sentences.cn: 电压可以成为温差的模拟表示.

sentences.en: This monolithic integrated circuit is an analog latch device with digital reset.
sentences.cn: 进口工业网的这种单片集成电路是带数字复位功能的模拟锁存设备.

sentences.en: Typically caused by mid frequency distortions in an analog system.
sentences.cn: 在模拟系统中通常是由中频信号的失真所引起.

words.tran_cn: 类似的；[昆] 同功的；可比拟的
对…作类比；以类推来说明（等于analogize）

phrases.tran_cn: 模拟时钟；指针式类比时钟
模拟输出；类比输出；相似输出

trans.tran_cn: （钟表）有长短针的，<电脑>模拟的
类似物，同源语，<电脑>模拟
